entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Sachigo Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of snow. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
